meanings.definition: The state of being confused or bewildered.
meanings.sent1: Her mazedness was evident as she tried to navigate the maze.
meanings.sent2: The mazedness on his face showed he had lost his way.
meanings.sent3: His mazedness at the magic trick made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The mazedness in her mind was like a tangled ball of yarn.
meanings.sent5: The mazedness of the situation left them feeling lost and unsure.

meanings.definition: The quality of being amazed or astonished.
meanings.sent1: The mazedness in her eyes was clear when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: His mazedness at the breathtaking view was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The mazedness of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her mazedness was like a spark of wonder in a dull day.
meanings.sent5: The mazedness in his voice made it clear he had never seen anything like it before.
